useCase.name: Researcher Collaborates with Faculty
useCase.trigger: Researcher wants to form collaborations with faculty

mainSequence.step: Researcher initiates a search for relevant faculty profiles
Research system queries faculty data based on search
Faculty profiles data is returned to researcher
System displays the search results to the researcher
Researcher reviews detailed information about faculty interests/expertise
Researcher requests more detailed information about selected faculty
Faculty profiles provide detailed information to the researcher
Researcher selects faculty members for collaboration
Researcher saves/preferences/notes for collaboration using Collaboration Module
CollaborationModule confirms the collaboration settings and provides next steps to researcher
